DataElement.preferredName: Absent Quality of Life Assessment Clinic Visit Reason
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the reason quality of life was not assessed during a clinic visit.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to absent quality of life assessment clinic visit.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Not existing in a specified place at a specified time.:The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life.  The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.:Examination of the body by auscultation, palpation, percussion, inspection, and olfaction.  (Taber's)

Concepts.definition: Not existing in a specified place at a specified time.

The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.

A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion and auscultation. The purpose is to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for an individual's health assessment.

Property.preferredDefinition: No value exists.:the act of going to see some person or place or thing for a short time.

Concepts.definition: No value exists.
The act of going to see some person or place or thing; it can cover a short or long period but refers to a non-permanent arrangement.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: information on quality of patient life and ability to function

Concepts.definition: The employees of an organization; personnel who assist their superior in carrying out an assigned task.
The act of conducting, controlling or supervising something.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
An ability to understand the meaning or importance of something (or the knowledge acquired as a result).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The employees of an organization; personnel who assist their superior in carrying out an assigned task._A matter of interest or importance._The reason of something._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Relating to the study or practice of medicine._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._That aspect of consciousness devoted to affect or feeling; a strong feeling, aroused mental state, or intense state of drive or unrest directed toward a definite object, with physiological, somatic, and behavioral components._A state of being, such as a state of health.

Concepts.definition: The employees of an organization; personnel who assist their superior in carrying out an assigned task.
A matter of interest or importance.
The reason of something.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
Relating to the study or practice of medicine.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.

That aspect of consciousness devoted to affect or feeling; a strong feeling, aroused mental state, or intense state of drive or unrest directed toward a definite object, with physiological, somatic, and behavioral components.
A state of being, such as a state of health.
